name: Rollkin
description:
Roll your way through dangerous shootouts in Rollkin - a high-octane arcade shooter where dodging and firing are your only options. No walking or jumping? No looking around? With those impenetrable rolls, our protagonist Rollkin needs none! Destroy your targets, finish your mission, and achieve that fancy hi-score in our Famicom/Mapper 0-inspired arcade game.

Credits:

Pipistrele - Design, Programming, Animation ( https://twitter.com/MeAndMyNerdyBat , https://pipistrele.itch.io/ )

Magickbird - Sprite Work ( https://twitter.com/magickbirb , http://pixeljoint.com/pixelart/119793.htm )

SketchyLogic, Jonathan So - Background Music ( https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles , https://jonathan-so.itch.io/ ) 

SoundsByDane - SFX ( https://soundsbydane.itch.io/ )
